name: Semantic Energy Functional
intent: Compute semantic energy for a given semantic trajectory.

signature.input: Trajectory r(t) and semantic Laplacian L

algebraic\_properties: E\_sem is quadratic in r and ṙ.
Under homogeneous wave dynamics, E\_sem is constant in time.
constraints: E\_sem must be finite for all trajectories considered physically or semantically admissible.
E\_sem must integrate with agency and cognitive layers to express the cost of maintaining semantics.
